metadata.purpose: Single source of truth for professional website, resumes, and AI agents

summary.headline: Technical Writer | Data Scientist | AI/ML Developer
summary.tagline: Bridge builder between technical complexity and human understanding
summary.description: Results-driven professional with a unique blend of chemical engineering foundation, technical writing expertise, and AI/ML development skills. Demonstrated ability to bridge complex technical concepts with clear communication through 5+ production-deployed projects leveraging cutting-edge technologies (Next.js 15, OpenAI GPT-4, Google Gemini API).
coreCompetencies: Technical Communication - Translating complex engineering and AI/ML concepts into accessible documentation
Full-Stack Development - End-to-end ownership from architecture to deployment (React, Node.js, Python)
AI/ML Integration - Production experience with OpenAI CLIP, GPT-4, and Google Gemini APIs
Data Analysis - Chemical engineering research background + modern data science tools
Problem Solving - Interdisciplinary approach combining engineering rigor with creative solutions
summary.valueProposition: Bridge builder between technical complexity and human understanding, with hands-on coding skills and engineering analytical mindset.

projects.projectDescription: An AI-powered full-stack web application that combines cutting-edge natural language processing with intuitive user experience design. Enables users to engage in intelligent conversations and extract insights from complex information through Google Gemini's advanced language models.
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered conversation platform using Google Gemini API
projects.myRole: Sole Developer - Architected and implemented entire solution end-to-end
responsibilities: System architecture and database design
Frontend development (responsive UI/UX)
Backend API development and AI integration
Deployment and production optimization
Ongoing maintenance and feature development

challengesFaced.description: Initial response times exceeded 3 seconds for complex queries
challengesFaced.solution: Implemented streaming responses and optimized prompt engineering
challengesFaced.result: Reduced perceived latency by 60% through progressive rendering

challengesFaced.solution: Architected robust session management with Supabase backend
challengesFaced.result: 100% conversation persistence with sub-200ms load times

challengesFaced.description: Balancing performance with API usage costs
challengesFaced.solution: Implemented intelligent caching and request batching
challengesFaced.result: 40% reduction in API calls while maintaining UX quality

keyLearnings: Mastered integration of generative AI APIs into production applications
Developed expertise in serverless architecture patterns (Vercel + Supabase)
Advanced skills in real-time data synchronization and state management
Deepened understanding of prompt engineering for optimal AI responses
Learned production-level error handling and graceful degradation strategies

impactMetrics.users: Active user base with growing engagement

projects.targetAudience: Researchers, entrepreneurs, students, and professionals seeking AI-powered insights

projects.projectDescription: A modern, performance-optimized personal portfolio website built with Next.js 14 and React. Features dynamic content rendering, SEO optimization, and responsive design. Showcases professional experience, technical projects, and thought leadership through integrated blog functionality.
projects.shortDescription: Modern Next.js 14 portfolio with perfect Lighthouse scores
projects.myRole: Sole Developer & Designer - Complete ownership of all aspects
responsibilities: UI/UX design and information architecture
Frontend development with React best practices
Content strategy and technical writing
SEO optimization and performance tuning
Deployment and continuous integration

challengesFaced.description: Achieving 100 Lighthouse scores across all categories
challengesFaced.solution: Implemented image optimization, code splitting, and lazy loading

challengesFaced.description: Balancing ease of content updates with performance
challengesFaced.solution: MDX-based blog system with static generation
challengesFaced.result: Sub-second page loads with easy content authoring

challengesFaced.description: Creating seamless experience across all device sizes
challengesFaced.solution: Mobile-first approach with Tailwind CSS breakpoints
challengesFaced.result: Consistent UX from mobile (320px) to 4K displays

keyLearnings: Mastered Next.js 14 App Router and React Server Components
Advanced understanding of static site generation (SSG) and incremental static regeneration (ISR)
Developed expertise in performance optimization techniques
Learned modern CSS architecture with utility-first frameworks
Gained experience in content strategy and SEO best practices

impactMetrics.seo: Page 1 Google rankings for target keywords

projects.targetAudience: Recruiters, hiring managers, potential collaborators, and industry professionals

projects.projectDescription: A Python-based command-line tool that leverages OpenAI's CLIP model and GPT-4 to automatically analyze, tag, and organize large image collections. Combines computer vision with natural language processing to generate contextually relevant tags and descriptions for images.
projects.shortDescription: Python CLI tool using CLIP and GPT-4 for automated image tagging
projects.myRole: Sole Developer - Complete development from research to deployment
responsibilities: AI model research and selection (evaluated CLIP, BLIP, ViT)
Python architecture and CLI design
OpenAI API integration (CLIP + GPT-4)
Image processing pipeline development
Documentation and user experience optimization

challengesFaced.description: Choosing optimal model for diverse image types
challengesFaced.solution: Benchmarked CLIP vs. alternatives on test dataset

challengesFaced.description: GPT-4 API costs for large image collections
challengesFaced.solution: Implemented intelligent batching and caching mechanisms

challengesFaced.description: Processing 1000+ images without excessive wait times
challengesFaced.result: Process 100 images in < 5 minutes on standard hardware

keyLearnings: Gained hands-on experience with state-of-the-art vision models (CLIP)
Mastered OpenAI API integration and prompt engineering for vision tasks
Developed expertise in Python CLI tool design and UX
Learned image processing pipelines and batch optimization
Understood trade-offs between model accuracy and computational cost
projects.targetAudience: Photographers, digital asset managers, content creators managing large image collections

projects.projectDescription: A Python automation tool designed to clean, organize, and standardize metadata for large music libraries. Handles common issues like inconsistent formatting, missing album art, incorrect tags, and duplicate files. Integrates with MusicBrainz API for accurate metadata retrieval.
projects.shortDescription: Python CLI for automated music library organization and metadata cleanup
responsibilities: Requirements analysis (personal pain points + community research)
Python architecture and file system handling
Metadata processing logic and API integration
CLI interface design and user documentation
Testing across diverse music file formats

challengesFaced.description: Supporting MP3, FLAC, AAC, M4A, OGG, etc.
Standardizing tags across different music sources
challengesFaced.solution: MusicBrainz API integration with fallback logic

keyLearnings: Mastered Python audio processing libraries and metadata standards
Developed expertise in file system operations and batch processing
Learned API integration patterns for music metadata services
Gained experience in CLI tool design for non-technical users
Understood audio fingerprinting algorithms and duplicate detection
projects.targetAudience: Music enthusiasts, DJs, audio engineers managing large digital music collections

projects.projectDescription: A cutting-edge portfolio website built with Next.js 15 and TypeScript, featuring an innovative neuromorphic design system. Implements glassmorphism, neumorphism, and advanced CSS effects to create a unique visual identity. Demonstrates mastery of modern web technologies and design trends.
projects.shortDescription: Next.js 15 portfolio with neuromorphic design system
projects.myRole: Sole Developer & Designer - Complete creative and technical control
responsibilities: Conceptualized neuromorphic design language
Architected Next.js 15 application with App Router
Developed custom design system with Tailwind CSS
Implemented complex animations and interactions
Deployed to production with CI/CD automation

challengesFaced.description: Translating neuromorphic concepts to web interfaces
challengesFaced.solution: Custom CSS with box-shadows, gradients, and blur effects

challengesFaced.description: Ensuring type safety across entire application
challengesFaced.solution: Strict TypeScript config with Zod runtime validation

challengesFaced.description: Maintaining performance with heavy visual effects
challengesFaced.solution: GPU acceleration, CSS optimization, lazy loading

keyLearnings: Mastered Next.js 15 and latest React Server Components patterns
Advanced TypeScript skills (generics, utility types, strict mode)
Developed expertise in modern CSS techniques (neuromorphism, glassmorphism)
Learned animation performance optimization and GPU acceleration
Gained experience balancing visual design with web performance

developmentTimeline.month1: Design system creation, visual language definition

projects.targetAudience: Design-conscious clients, creative agencies, tech companies seeking innovative frontend developers

achievements: Completed 18-credit senior design capstone project
Developed expertise in MATLAB, Excel, and engineering simulation software
Strong foundation in analytical problem-solving and quantitative analysis

experience.title: AI Math Specialist
experience.description: Specialized AI training role focused on improving mathematical reasoning capabilities of large language models through expert evaluation, feedback, and quality assessment.
responsibilities: Evaluate AI-generated mathematical solutions for accuracy, clarity, and pedagogical effectiveness
Provide detailed feedback to improve model performance on complex math problems
Create high-quality training examples across algebra, calculus, statistics, and applied mathematics
Assess model responses for logical consistency and mathematical rigor
Collaborate with ML engineers to identify model weaknesses and improvement opportunities
achievements: Contributed to improving mathematical reasoning capabilities of frontier AI models
Maintained high-quality standards across 100+ evaluation tasks
Identified and documented patterns in model performance gaps

experience.title: Technical Writing Freelancer
experience.description: Independent technical writer providing documentation, content creation, and communication services for technology companies, SaaS platforms, and engineering firms.
responsibilities: Research, write, and edit technical documentation (API docs, user guides, tutorials)
Translate complex technical concepts into accessible content for diverse audiences
Collaborate with engineering teams to document software features and workflows
Create developer documentation with code examples and integration guides
Maintain documentation version control and content management systems
achievements: Improved documentation clarity scores by 40% (measured via user feedback)
Reduced support ticket volume through comprehensive troubleshooting guides
Built long-term client relationships with high satisfaction ratings

experience.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Independent software developer building modern web applications with focus on AI/ML integration, full-stack JavaScript/TypeScript, and Python automation tools.
responsibilities: Architect and develop full-stack applications using Next.js, React, Node.js
Integrate AI/ML APIs (OpenAI, Google Gemini) into production applications
Build Python CLI tools for automation and data processing
Deploy and maintain applications on cloud platforms (Vercel, AWS)
Implement responsive UI/UX with modern CSS frameworks (Tailwind CSS)
achievements: Deployed 5 production applications with 99%+ uptime
Built growing portfolio attracting client inquiries and collaboration opportunities
Demonstrated mastery of modern web development and AI/ML integration

strengths: Analytical Rigor - Strong ability to analyze complex problems systematically
Results-Oriented - Driven to achieve tangible outcomes and measurable results
Independent Thinking - Comfortable working autonomously with minimal supervision
High Standards - Maintains quality and accuracy in all work
Efficient Execution - Balances thorough analysis with timely decision-making

communicationStyle.prefers: Data-driven discussions, logical arguments, clear objectives

workPreferences.idealEnvironment: Structured yet autonomous, with clear goals and metrics
workPreferences.motivation: Solving complex problems, achieving measurable results
workPreferences.decisionMaking: Evidence-based analysis combined with decisive action
